name: Voxel Zombies
description:
Voxel Zombies is game that is based around a similar concept / is the concept of the game nazi zombies (A gamemode from the game COD:WaW) Voxel Zombies is the recreation of this using voxels with a few features that are added.

GAME WAS DEVELOPED FOR VOXELJAM IN A ONE MONTH PERIOD

Things that were scraped due to development times:

-Ablity to place and remove blocks

-Rebuildable Windows where you can place blocks

-Buildable Structures

If there is enough support for the game I will most likly start working on these features as well as updating all the in-game models including the zombies.
